title: LF Players For My Ranked Team/ Team Members Will Be GIFTED SKINS ONCE A WEEK.
body: Currently looking for a mid, top, adc, and sup player. I myself am a gold 3 jungler who just transferred over from the NA server. My gamer tag name is Shaed Wzrd add me as a friend and we can talk more. I will give everyone a fair chance. Also everyone that joins my team and is worth keeping will be gifted a skin personally by me once a week. Gamer tag is Shaed Wzrd

replies.body:
Gold 5, was Gold 3 Season 4 however due to inactivity as i did not have a team, found my way back into Silver but got myself back into Gold this season.
I let my skills in the Field of Justice do the talking, add me and we can have a trial
I can play any role well.
Looking for that serious team to take the game to the next level.

I have been looking for a ranked team but everyone is looking for plat+
Im only silver IV lol
Plat v looking to fill really interested in playing 5's
i don't care about the skins to b honest i just want a good team mate thanks if you do looking for same add me my IGN is GBG727

Hi, I'm a silver 3 ADC main. {{item:3031}} 
IGN: LeggingAffirmed
I know someone else applied for the ADC position but I would like to try out as well.
Anyway, I have a 10:1 KDA on Tristana + Jinx
I had a bad lucian game today though and my kda dropped from 10.61:1 to a 9.31 kda. Out of my 50ish ranked games, I've lost lane about 2-3 times.
My main adc is lucian and I'm currently 13-1 on him.
Let me know if you're interested!
I can play all marksmen and adapt to what you guys need.
thanks man
(if you look at my ranked match history, please scroll down a bit, I had 2 bad games today :( )

Depending on frequency of games and times, i might be interested.
Transfered over from EUW recently ;) Support main.
Never really played ranked consistently enough to reach gold, i just played placements to have the Silver border :P It'd be good to have a serious team for once.
add me we need a sup and a mid
I'm unranked but I can give a mean blow job.

I'll play

I'm bronze 4, I play once a month, main jungle karthus. gibe skins pls.
